rows.label: qst200415_msg0001
rows.name:
This wound... She was struck precisely
in a vital spot with a blade.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0002
rows.name: No signs of a struggle...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0003
rows.name:
Does that mean she was
killed in one blow?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0004
rows.name:
She was likely killed without even
realizing she was being attacked.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0005
rows.name: This is the work of an assassin...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0006
rows.name:
How awful... Why did she
have to be killed...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0007
rows.name:
...You there. How long
do you intend to hide?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0008
rows.name:
Yo... Heartless Judge. Has
it been twenty years?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0009
rows.name: But still, I'm surprised.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0010
rows.name:
The one and only assassination
group, the Bloody Lobster.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0011
rows.name:
To think the Blade interfering
with our work was you.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0012
rows.name:
Interfering with your work...?
What are you talking about?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0013
rows.name: Hah! Are you going to play dumb now?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0014
rows.name:
Because you captured our precious
client, a big money-making deal
went down the drain.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0016
rows.name:
Sheesh, for someone who wanted to
wash their hands of this so badly,
why'd you willingly come back?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0017
rows.name:
Or did you start missing the
killing? Mr. Heartless Judge.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0018
rows.name: ...You know me from the past?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0019
rows.name:
I know neither you, nor the
name "Heartless Judge".

rows.label: qst200415_msg0020
rows.name:
I now wield power over life and
death, and so, I do not kill. I
am not the Vasara you know.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0021
rows.name: Haha... Hahaha!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0022
rows.name:
The man who killed women and
children without batting an
eye now preaches not killing?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0023
rows.name: Ahahahaha! What kind of joke is this?!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0024
rows.name:
...This is your doing. Why
did you kill this woman?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0025
rows.name: ...Why?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0026
rows.name:
Because it's my job. Is
there any other reason?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0027
rows.name:
The person who hired you has been
judged by me. You won't be able
to receive payment, will you?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0028
rows.name: Hey, hey, have you forgotten?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0029
rows.name:
Whatever the reason, once we
take a job, we see it through.
That's our rule, isn't it?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0030
rows.name:
Trust is everything in this world.
...Or did you forget that too?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0031
rows.name:
You used to be a monster
who killed for pleasure,
not for money or fame.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0032
rows.name:
People change, don't they...
Ah, no, you were a Blade.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0033
rows.name: ...Is that all you have to say?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0034
rows.name:
Calm down, Vasara. This
is just a warning.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0035
rows.name:
If you interfere with my
work any further, you'll
end up like this too.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0036
rows.name:
Don't you forget it,
Vasara the non-killer.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0037
rows.name: What a creepy fellow...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0038
rows.name:
However, judging from his methods,
he is extremely skilled.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0039
rows.name:
He is by no means an opponent
to be taken lightly.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0041
rows.name: Vasara! Where are you going?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0042
rows.name: It is decided... I will pursue him.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0043
rows.name: That man must not be left at large...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0044
rows.name:
You're going to avenge
Ellenora-san, right? Are you
going to do it alone again?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0045
rows.name:
...It seems that man's grudge
is with me alone. There is no
need for you to be involved.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0046
rows.name:
Vasara... This is no longer just
your problem. It is our problem.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0049
rows.name:
This is a problem that we should solve
by combining all our strengths.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0050
rows.name: That's right, Vasara! Let us help you!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0051
rows.name: ...Honestly.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0052
rows.name: If you insist, then do as you please.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0053
rows.name:
Now that's decided, we first need
to gather information on that man.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0054
rows.name:
Let's use the Mercenary
Group to gather information
on the Bloody Lobster.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0055
rows.name:
If we can grasp his next
move, Vasara and we should
be able to handle it...
